cosmos.question: I'm big and bright and shine up high, you see me in the daytime sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
🌞 I help plants grow.
💛 You need sunglasses to look at me.

cosmos.question: I’m round and white, and shine at night, sometimes I change my shape in sight. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Some people say I am made of cheese.
🐺 Wolves howl at me.
🌑 I go around the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas, far, far away with a shiny mass. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle at night.
🌌 There are many like me in the sky.
🔭 You need a telescope to see me closely.

cosmos.question: I am where you live, a big blue sphere, with land and oceans far and near. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 You can find your house on me.
💧 I am mostly water.
🌍 People live on me.

cosmos.question: I am red, and sometimes dusty, another planet, are you ready? What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 Robots have been sent to explore me.
🍫 I am the color of rust.
🔥 I am named after a Roman god of war.

cosmos.question: I have rings around me, made of ice and rock, I'm a giant planet, give it a knock! What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very beautiful.
💨 I am made of gas.
🪐 I am the second largest planet in our solar system.

cosmos.question: I'm a group of stars, a pretty picture you see, maybe a bear, or something else, what could I be?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 major is one of these
✨ Connect the dots to find me.
➡️ Some of them form shapes of animals or people.

cosmos.question: I'm a very big group of stars, gas and dust. Our Sun and all the stars you see, are part of me, you must! What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am very, very big!
💫 I am shaped like a spiral.
🥛 I am called the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I am a space rock that flies through the sky, sometimes with a tail as I zoom on by. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am made of ice and dust.
☄️ I get brighter when I get closer to the Sun.
💥 Sometimes I crash into planets.

cosmos.question: I am a hot, glowing ball of plasma, and our Solar System orbits around me. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐️ I am a very big star.
✨ I hold our solar system together with gravity.
☀️ I am the center of our Solar System.

options.label: The Center of the Milky Way

weather.question: I fall from the sky, and you can play in me, but you need to wear a coat. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am cold.
🧤 You wear gloves when I fall.
☃️ You can make a snowman with me.

weather.question: I come from the sky and make everything wet. You need an umbrella when I fall. What am I?

hints.text: 💧I fall in drops.
☔I make puddles.
🌧️ Flowers and plants love me.

weather.question: I am big and yellow and give you warmth. I disappear at night. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️I shine bright.
😎 You might need sunglasses when I'm around.
🔥I am a star.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. Sometimes I block the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like a sheep sometimes.
🌫️ I can be thin or thick.
🌧️ Rain can come from me.

weather.question: I blow through the trees and make them sway. I can be gentle or strong. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃I can make leaves fall.
🪁You can fly a kite with me.
💨I am air moving fast.

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky, and I come with a loud boom. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I come during a storm.
⛈️ I am often followed by thunder.
💡 I am a bright spark.

weather.question: After the rain, if the sun peeks through, I appear with many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am an arc in the sky.
🎨 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
☀️ I need both sun and rain to appear.

weather.question: I am cold and hard, and sometimes I fall from the sky during a thunderstorm. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am made of frozen water.
🤕 I can hurt if I hit you.
⚾ I am like a small ball of ice.

weather.question: I am white and I come from clouds, but I am not rain or snow. You can't see very far when I am around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I make it hard to see.
☁️ I am like a cloud close to the ground.
🚗 You need to be careful driving in me.

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds that spin around and around over the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a name.
🌊 I can cause a lot of damage.
🌬️ I am a very strong wind.
